text: avviruvaril yar vitutalai ataivar enru enninaro avaritam, "ennaip parri um ejamananitam kuruviraka!" Enrum connar; anal (ciraiyiliruntu vitutavaiyakiya) avar tam ejamananitam (itaip parrik) kuruvatiliruntu saittan avarai marakkatittu vittan; akave avar ciraikkutattil (pinnum) cila antukal irukka ventiyavaranar
